channel.title: Hong Kong on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Hong Kong on PepsFeeder

item.title: Huge crowd of protesters in Hong Kong for six months of protest
item.description: The rally took place two weeks after the victory of the pro-democracy opposition in the local elections. 800,000 people were reunited, according to pro-democracy activists.

item.title: China threatens US retaliation for supporting Hong Kong protests
item.description: BEIJING (Reuters) – China’s Foreign Ministry on Tuesday summoned a senior US diplomat and threatened retaliatory measures against Washington after the US Senate adopted a law supporting demonstrators in Hong Kong, which has been under protests since June.

item.title: After China described him as a poison .. Apple acquiesces and removes a special application maps Hong Kong
item.description: HONG KONG (Reuters) – Apple on Wednesday removed an application from its shop that protesters in Hong Kong used to track police moves through, claiming it violated rules because it was used to ambush police.
